Raula Gaikovina Kula, Dr. Eng.

Research Assistant Professor (特任助教)

Software Engineering Lab @ Nara Institute of Science and Technology, Nara, Japan

  • Mentor/Teacher
  • Researcher/Scientist
  • Software Engineer

Journal Articles

In 22nd IEEE International Conference on Software Analysis, Evolution, and Reengineering, SANER 2015, Montreal, Canada, March 2-6, 2015. Retrieved from http://sel.ist.osaka-u.ac.jp/ raula-k/publications/latencyAdoptions2015ERA.pdf

In 14th IEEE International Working Conference on Source Code Analysis and Manipulation, SCAM 2014, Victoria, BC, Canada, September 28-29, 2014 (pp. 305–314). Retrieved from http://dx.doi.org/10.1109/SCAM.2014.17
